name: vue-componentize
description: Turn a component block into a vue component.

vue-componentize.components.path.description: Defines the default path to write the newly created components.

vue-componentize.script.defaultLanguage.description: Defines the default language used when adding a <script> tag.

vue-componentize.script.ts.template.description: Defines the template when creating an empty <script> tag in TypeScript.

vue-componentize.script.ts.props.add.description: Whether to automatically add props to the newly created component.

vue-componentize.script.ts.props.templat.description: Defines the template for adding props into the newly created component in TypeScript (${options}: options of the prop, ${name}: snakeCased name of the prop, ${type}: type of the prop).

vue-componentize.script.ts.import.add.description: Whether you would like the extension to automatically add an import for the newly created component inside your <script> tag.

vue-componentize.script.ts.import.templa.description: The template for adding a new import for a newly created component (${name}: studly name of the component, ${path}: relative path of the component).

vue-componentize.script.js.import.add.description: Whether you would like the extension to automatically add an import for the newly created component inside your <script> tag.

vue-componentize.script.js.import.templa.description: The template for adding a new import for a newly created component (${name}: studly name of the component, ${path}: relative path of the component).

vue-componentize.script.js.props.add.description: Whether to automatically add props to the newly created component.

vue-componentize.script.js.props.templat.description: Defines the template for adding props into the newly created component in JavaScript (${name}: snakeCased name of the prop, ${type}: type of the prop).

vue-componentize.script.js.template.description: Defines the template when creating an empty <script> tag in JavaScript.

vue-componentize.template.defaultLanguag.description: Defines the default language used when adding a <template> tag.

vue-componentize.template.html.template.description: Defines the template when creating an empty <template> tag in HTML. Useful if you would like the newly created components to be wrapped inside <div> tags for instance. (${content}: content of the component)

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
